channel.title: Best Staker/Pker
channel.description: I've been wondering what the best type of staker you could possibly have - Like the best stats for a staker. Also a Pker... Thanks

item.title: Best Staker/Pker
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“uncfan1119, post:6, topic:101900”]NO! NO! NO!

BEST STAKERS DO NOT HAVE PRAYER!

For pker i suggest

60 att

38 prayer

80+ str

1 def

82+ mage with ancients

60+ range

The strategy you would use with this is dds d scimmy and ice blitz

best staker

70+att
like 40 str
70+def
1 prayer
mage and range are up to you

you would be a tanker and wear full thorag or full verac

those are just my suggestions but normally they are the most succesful

To many cb lvls. AND PRAY IS NEVER ON IN DUELS that people stake,so its useless.[/quote]

learn to read because your a complete idiot…

Read full topic
